ygData.subject: Need the opinion of ALL tinkers!
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings: As many of you might not check the Workbench forum due to it s low post count, I d thought I d throw a post in here requesting your presence in a
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings:

As many of you might not check the Workbench forum due to it's low post
count, I'd thought I'd throw a post in here requesting your presence in a
thread I just started.

http://pub7.ezboard.com/ffulcrumstinkeringforumstheworkbench.showMessage?topicID=14.topic

This thread requires your input so we can perhaps influence the changes to
tinkering that Abashi has promised us.

Thanks!
___
QdP
Gnomish Magi
Ilsik Haucil
Mith Marr Server

"Quasinom de Plume is my quasi nom-de-plume"
